author: Anthony Spadafora
title: Google could eliminate VPNs for millions with this new tool
description: Google Cloud has launched a new security tool for remote access which has been used internally by the company for almost a decade.
content:
As the number of remote workers has surged as a result of the global pandemic, Google Cloud has launched a new security tool designed to allow users to access their company networks remotely without using a VPN.
The company's new cloud-based security solutio… [+2600 chars]
